abstract: Yahoo has started an invitation-only preview of a new social networking site, Yahoo Mash. It is quite an homage to Facebook, but it adds one significant new wrinkle: users can edit each other’s profiles, redecorating, changing information, and adding features.
snippet: Yahoo has started an invitation-only preview of a new social networking site, Yahoo Mash. It is quite an homage to Facebook, but it adds one significant new wrinkle: users can edit each other’s profiles, redecorating, changing information, and add...
lead_paragraph: I just turned Brad Garlinghouse’s profile on Yahoo’s new social network, Yahoo Mash, peanut butter brown.

headline.main: Yahoo Mash: The Social Network for Graffiti Lovers
